objective_id.title: objective_id
objective_id.description: The Objective ID for this Quest Objective. This has to be unique for this Quest.

objective_description.title: objective_description
objective_description.description: The Objective's description shown on the sidebar.

objective_max.title: objective_max
objective_max.description: The max number that the objective data can go up to. This number has to be above 1.

objective_default.title: objective_default
objective_default.description: [OPTIONAL] The default objective value that this objective starts at.

visible.title: visible
visible.description: Toggles on whether or not this Objective is displayed in the questbook. Good for internal/hidden quest values

display_number.title: display_number
display_number.description: Toggles on whether or not this objective will have its objective data amount displayed, along with its maximum.

prerequisites.description: The prerequisites to display this objective in the quest book. Leave this blank if this objective will always be available.

stages.description: The actions done on certain stages (value numbers) of the Quest Objective.

items.title: Stage
items.description: A stage in the Quest Objective progression

value.title: value
value.description: The value that the Quest Objective needs to be at in order for these actions to trigger

actions.description: The actions to be performed when the quest reaches this stage

completion.description: The actions done on completion. Can be left blank.
